question: September 29 is observed as the ____________.
explanation: World Heart Day is celebrated every year on September 29. Organized by the World Heart Federation, the day is marked to spread awareness about cardiovascular diseases, which is the world's biggest killer and claims more than 17.5 million lives all around the world. World Heart Day on September 29 is the biggest platform for raising awareness about cardiovascular diseases (CVD). This is a platform for the CVD community to unite in the fight against and reduce the global disease burden.
